keyMoments.description: Nami defeats CP9 member Kalifa, securing a key victory for the crew in the Enies Lobby assault
keyMoments.significance: First major CP9 defeat by a Straw Hat member, boosting morale and proving the crew can compete with elite government agents

keyMoments.description: Franky rescues Chopper from his dangerous Monster Point transformation by blasting him into the sea
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the growing bond between Franky and the Straw Hats, foreshadowing his eventual recruitment

keyMoments.description: Zoro and Usopp are freed from their handcuffs, allowing them to fight at full strength
keyMoments.significance: Removes a major handicap and enables the crew to fight more effectively against CP9

keyMoments.description: Kalifa becomes the first CP9 member to be defeated during the Enies Lobby battles, losing to Nami
keyMoments.significance: First crack in CP9's seemingly invincible defense, showing they can be beaten by the Straw Hats
